transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Anurag baat kar raha tha sir India Mart se baat hui thi na aapki?
Customer: Haan bolun.
Executive: Sir aapko na India Mart ka ek message aaya hoga agar whatsapp aap open karenge to ek baar open karke dekhiye India Mart ki side se ek message aaya hoga vyapar ke liye hi us pe whatsapp pe aapko reply karna hai keval yes.
Executive: To wo directly aapko sari verification login details waha par mil jayegi.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Aayega sir ji. Uh ek second aap abhi online hai sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek second maine aapko ek video meeting ka link bheja hai aap ek baar open karenge?
Customer: Hmm?
Executive: Video meeting ka link bheja hai aapko mail ek baar open karo aap.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Aap apna mail open kijiye mail.
Customer: Accha mail pe.
Customer: Haan kiya.
Executive: Aapko ek meeting ka link aaya hoga video meet with India Mart.
Customer: Join karu kya?
Executive: Haan join karo.
(silence)
Executive: Apan ja vyaktishi bolat aahat tyani aapla call hold var thevla aahe. Krupaya line var raha. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received the IndiaMART message.

- Customer needs assistance to join video meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to check WhatsApp for message.

- Executive sent a video meeting link to customer's email.

- Executive guided customer to open email and join meeting.

- Call put on hold.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, whatsapp, email, verification
